artiano.neural.network

类 Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • artiano.core.operation.Preservable
      • artiano.neural.network.Network
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    ActivationNetwork, DistanceNetwork

    public abstract class Network
extends Preservable

    Description: base class of every neural network

    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
